episode20.name: 20   Hogs Beatdown Ole Miss
episode20.description: Arkansas puts together their second straight SEC shutout with a huge win over Ole Miss. This makes Arkansas bowl eligible for the first time in two seasons.
episode20.summary: On this week's episode, the crew breaks down Arkansas' rousing win  over Ole Miss. Who caught the crew's eye? What does this mean for the  future of the Hogs? Why did this game remind Chuck of 1998? The crew  also looks ahead to the Missouri game and talk about why the Tigers  just keep finding ways to win. Colby fields some questions about  recruiting and the guys even discuss bowl possibilities. This was a  jam-packed episode of The Hogcast, and you won't want to miss any of  it. Go Hogs.
episode20.keywords: Arkansas, Hogs, The Hog Cast, SEC, SEC WEST , Ole Miss, Rebels, College Football, CFB, Razorbacks
